description: This film biography deals with the life and work of the classic Russian director, Sergei Mikhailovitch Eisenstein, 1989-1948. Extracts from some of his best known films including "Potemkin", "Old and New", "Ten Days that Shook the World" and "Ivan the Terrible". Homage is paid to the director by Sergei Prokofiev, Gregori Alexandrov and Guiseppe de Santis.
